name: 知識管理研究
description:
The goal of the course is to prepare students to become familiar with the theories, practices, techniques and tools in knowledge management, and to assist students to master the practices of knowledge management in organization, at the end of the course students will be able to:
1. Understand the development of KM.
2. Understand the principles and practices of KM.
3. Understand the issues of KM.
4. Audit tangible and intangible knowledge assets in organization.
5. Use the tools of KM.
6. Learn how to construct a KM program in a organization.
goals: 探討知識的成長模式、知識管理的功能和流程、知識管理的顯性策略和隱性策略的發展趨勢
